Reported by the Committee on Government Reform. H. Rept. 104-174.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 85.

official_title: To repeal the authorization of transitional appropriations for the United States Postal Service, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of Federal law authorizing appropriations to the Postal Service Fund (Fund) to insure a sound financial transition for the Postal Service and a consistent rate policy. Provides that liabilities of the former Post Office Department to the Employees' Compensation Fund shall be liabilities of the Postal Service payable out of the Fund.

titles.title: To repeal the authorization of transitional appropriations for the United States Postal Service, and for other purposes.
